Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image shared by BJP accounts and leaders is not actually an image of an Indian navy ship, but of a US Navy ship.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the celebration of Navy Day in India by suggesting that the image shared by BJP accounts and leaders is in celebration of Indian Navy Day, when in fact it is an image of a US Navy ship.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the image shared by BJP accounts and leaders is related to Navy Day or the accomplishments of the Indian Navy.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image shared by BJP accounts and leaders is in celebration of Indian Navy Day, without providing sufficient evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the image shared by BJP accounts and leaders may have been a mistake or oversight, rather than a deliberate attempt to misrepresent the Indian Navy.
